Pokemon API data

poke_data.Rd

Extract of some data from the 151 first Pokemons.

Usage

poke_data

Format

poke_data

A nested list with 151 entries. Each sublist contains:

name

Char: Pokemon name.

description

Char: Pokemon description.

shape

Char: Pokemon shape.

sprites

List: Front and back sprites (images).

front_defaultChar: front sprite URL shiny_defaultChar: front sprite URL (shiny form)
habitat

Char: Pokemon habitat.

...

Source

https://pokeapi.co/docs/v2

Note

Have a look to inst/app-doc/data-doc.html to get an interactive overview.
